page.title: 20Froglane Farm.
page.content: Mr. Guy Elliot,who is an arable farmer,owns a farm called{Froglane {farm}which he shares with his brother.Their 12 fields make up a total of 150 acres.Mr.Elliot owns 60 acres and rents 90. He has one dog and he breeds pheasants.He buys them as chicks and breeds them until shooting season.Next Mr. Elliot shoots them and takes them home for his wife to pluck them. His family have owned the farm for 63 years.It was built in 1852. In all Mr. Elliot has 36 pieces of farm machinery.One of his hobbies is collecting machinery of the past. He uses his fields for:winter barley,winter wheat,winter beans, spring wheat,turnips and potatoes.
